Background

Who is The Red Fox

  • location Ottawa
  • widely acknowledged institution
  • research covers a wide range of pediatric issues
  • tradition and community

Target audience

  • shareholders of CHEO

Client

The Children’s Hospital of Eastern Ontario is a widely acknowledged institution and a large pillar in the Ottawa reign community. The CHEO Research Institute is the research section of CHEO. Their research covers a wide range of pediatric issues.

Target audience

The target audience are the shareholders of CHEO. These shareholders are business men and woman. Thier interest lays in knowing how thier investment is doing.

The Process

Objective

To create a bilingual annual report that will help inform the shareholders about how their investment is doing.

Moodboard

Infographic, bright, science, simplistic

Sketches

Final Product

Concept

The concept for this annual report was to keep it graphic based, using a lot of infographics, icons and simple illustrations. Having a heavily graphic report will give it a pleasing appearance, while also making it easy for the shareholders to understand the information.

Style

The style of this report is graphic and science based. The science elements were important as it reflects the science based industry the company works in. Consistent circle pattern that resemble cells were used as a recurring pattern throughout report. Each section has graphic elements that explain the information on the page. The colours are bright and bold. This gives the booklet a positive and uplifting feel and reflects the good work the research institute does.
